description: A triangle of coefficients of a Moebius-transformed Pascal triangle as a sum: b(x,y,n)=Sum[Binomial[n,i]*x^i*y^(n-i),{i,0,n}]; transforms: x'->(a1*x + b1)/(c1*x + d1); y'->(a2*y + b2)/(c2*y + d2); b1(x,y,n)=(c1*x + b1)^(k)*(c2*y + d2)^(k)*b(x',y',n); f(x,y,z,n)=b1(x,y,n)+b1(y,z,n)+b1(z,x,n).
